title: Mai-HiME Specials (My-Hime Specials)
synopsis: Extra shorts that come after each episode. This entry also includes the Mai Hime vs. Mai Otome - "Moe"? The Greatest Battle! episode.
characters: ['Kuga, Natsuki', 'Tokiha, Mai', 'Minagi, Mikoto', 'Fujino, Shizuru', 'Yuuki, Nao', 'Okuzaki, Akira', 'Sugiura, Midori', 'Tate, Yuuichi', 'Homura, Nagi', 'Suzushiro, Haruka']
